EnrollAccount.summary: Enrolls an account. You can create a new account or manage an existing account in the account factory.

schema.title: 账号名称前缀
schema.description:
The prefix for the account name of the member.

*   If the account baseline is applied to an account that is newly created, you must configure this parameter.
*   If the account baseline is applied to an existing account, you do not need to configure this parameter.

schema.title: 账号显示名称
schema.description:
The display name of the account.

*   If the account baseline is applied to an account that is newly created, you must configure this parameter.
*   If the account baseline is applied to an existing account, you do not need to configure this parameter.

schema.title: 父资源夹ID
schema.description:
The ID of the parent folder.

*   If the account baseline is applied to an account that is newly created, you need to specify a parent folder. If you do not configure this parameter, the account is created in the Root folder.
*   If the account baseline is applied to an existing account, you do not need to configure this parameter.

schema.title: 结算账号ID
schema.description:
The ID of the billing account.

*   If the account baseline is applied to an account that is newly created, you need to specify a billing account. If you do not configure this parameter, the self-pay settlement method is used for the account.
*   If the account baseline is applied to an existing account, you do not need to configure this parameter.

schema.title: 注册账号ID
schema.description:
The account ID.

*   If the account baseline is applied to an account that is newly created, you do not need to configure this parameter.
*   If the account baseline is applied to an existing account, you must configure this parameter.

schema.title: 基线项配置数组
schema.description:
An array that contains baseline items.

If this parameter is specified, the configurations of the baseline items are merged with the baseline of the specified account. The configurations of the same baseline items are subject to the configuration of this parameter. We recommend that you leave this parameter empty and configure the `BaselineId` parameter to specify an account baseline and apply the configuration of the account baseline to the account.

items.description: The configurations of the baseline item.

Config.title: 基线项配置
Config.description: The configurations of the baseline item.

Name.title: 基线项名称
Name.description: The name of the baseline item.

Skip.title: 是否跳过基线项
Skip.description:
Specifies whether to skip the baseline item. Valid values:

*   false: The baseline item is not skipped.
*   true: The baseline item is skipped.

Version.title: 基线项版本
Version.description: The version of the baseline item.

schema.title: 基线ID
schema.description:
The baseline ID.

If this parameter is left empty, the default baseline is used.

schema.title: 账号身份类型
schema.description:
The identity type of the member. Valid values:

*   resell (default): The member is an account for a reseller. A relationship is automatically established between the member and the reseller. The management account of the resource directory must be used as the billing account of the member.
*   non_resell: The member is not an account for a reseller. The member is an account that is not associated with a reseller. You can directly use the account to purchase Alibaba Cloud resources. The member is used as its own billing account.

> This parameter is available only for resellers at the international site (alibabacloud.com).

400.errorMessage: The specified parameter %s is not valid.
The %s blueprint is being deployed. Please wait for its deployment to complete and try again.
The %s blueprint has not been deployed. Please deploy the resource structure first.
The dependency of %s baseline item has not been configured. Please config %s first.
The current status of the blueprint does not support this operation.

403.errorMessage: The specified account is not a master account of resource directory.

404.errorMessage: The specified user does not exist.
The specified blueprint does not exist.
The specified baseline item named %s does not exist.
The specified account has not passed enterprise real name verification. Please complete the verification for the account first.

EnrollAccount.title: EnrollAccount
EnrollAccount.description:
You can call this API operation to create a new account or manage an existing account and apply the account baseline to the account.

Accounts are created in asynchronous mode. After you create an account, you can apply the account baseline to the account. You can call the [GetEnrolledAccount API](~~GetEnrolledAccount~~) operation to view the details about the account to obtain the result of applying the account baseline to the account.

BatchEnrollAccounts.summary: Applies an account baseline to multiple existing resource accounts at a time.

items.description: The information about the resource account.

AccountUid.description: The account ID. This parameter is required.

schema.description:
The baseline items.

If this parameter is specified, the configurations of the baseline items are merged with the baseline applied to the specified account. The configurations of the same baseline items are subject to the configurations of this parameter. We recommend that you leave this parameter empty and configure the `BaselineId` parameter to specify an account baseline and apply the configurations of the account baseline to the account.

items.description: The configurations of the baseline item.

Config.description: The configurations of the baseline item.

Name.description: The name of the baseline item.

Skip.description:
Specifies whether to skip the baseline item. Valid values:

*   false
*   true

Version.description: The version of the baseline item.

schema.description:
The baseline ID.

If this parameter is left empty, the default baseline is used.

404.errorMessage: The specified account has not passed enterprise real name verification. Please complete the verification for the account first.

BatchEnrollAccounts.title: BatchEnrollAccounts
BatchEnrollAccounts.description:
You can call this operation to apply an account baseline to existing resource accounts.

Accounts are enrolled in the account factory in asynchronous mode. After a resource account is created, an account baseline is applied to the account. You can call the [GetEnrolledAccount](~~609062~~) operation to query the details of the account enrolled in the account factory and check whether the account baseline is applied to the account.

ListEnrolledAccounts.summary: Queries a list of accounts that are enrolled in the account factory.

schema.title: 查询返回结果下一页的令牌。首次调用API不需要NextToken
schema.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.

schema.title: 每页的最大数据条数
schema.description:
The maximum number of entries to return on each page.

Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

CreateTime.title: 创建时间
CreateTime.description: The time at which the account was created.

DisplayName.title: 账号显示名称
DisplayName.description: The display name of the account.

FolderId.title: 父资源夹ID
FolderId.description: The ID of the parent folder.

PayerAccountUid.title: 结算账号ID
PayerAccountUid.description: The ID of the billing account.

Status.title: 创建状态
Status.description:
The creation status of the account. Valid values:

*   Pending: The account is waiting to be created.
*   Running: The account is being created.
*   Finished: The account is created.
*   Failed: The account failed to be created.
*   Scheduling: The account is being scheduled.
*   ScheduleFailed: The account failed to be scheduled.

UpdateTime.title: 更新时间
UpdateTime.description: The time when the information about the account was updated.

NextToken.title: 查询返回结果下一页的令牌
NextToken.description: The returned value of NextToken is a pagination token, which can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results.

Progress.title: 基线实施进度
Progress.description: The progress of the applying the baseline to the account.

items.description: The progress of applying the account baseline to the account.

Name.title: 基线项名称
Name.description: The name of the baseline item.

Status.title: 基线项实施状态
Status.description:
The status of applying the baseline to the account. Valid values:

*   Pending: The baseline is pending to be applied to the account.
*   Running: The baseline is being applied to the account.
*   Finished: : The baseline is applied to the account.
*   Failed: : The baseline fails to be applied to the account.

Status.title: 账号注册状态
Status.description:
The status of the account. Valid values:

*   Pending: The account is pending to be created.
*   Running: The account is being created.
*   Finished: The account is created.
*   Failed: The account fails to be created.
*   Scheduling: The account is being scheduled.
*   ScheduleFailed: The account fails to be scheduled.

ListEvaluationMetricDetails.summary: Queries the non-compliant resource information of a check item, including the name, ID, category, type, region, and related metadata of non-compliant resources.

schema.description:
The ID of the check item.

You can call the [ListEvaluationMetadata](~~2841889~~) operation to query the ID of the check item.
The account ID of the member. This parameter takes effect only when a multi-account governance maturity check is performed.
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results.
The maximum number of entries to return for a single request. Default value: 5.

NextToken.description: A pagination token. It can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results.

Resources.description: The details of the non-compliant resources.

items.description: The details of the non-compliant resource.

ComplianceType.description:
合规状态。取值：
- NonCompliant：不合规。
- Excluded：已忽略。
- PendingExclusion：已忽略未生效。
- PendingInclusion：已取消忽略未生效。

RegionId.title: 资源所属 region
RegionId.description: The region ID of the resource.

The check results further analyzed by auxiliary decision-making.

>  This parameter is returned only when the check item supports the auxiliary decision-making feature.

PropertyValue.description: The value of the resource attribute.

ListEvaluationResults.summary: Queries the result and status of a governance maturity check.

schema.description: The Alibaba Cloud account ID of the member. This parameter takes effect only when a multi-account governance maturity check is performed.

AccountId.description: The Alibaba Cloud account ID of the member.

Results.description: The check results, including the status of the overall check and the results of check items.

EvaluationTime.description: The end time of the overall check. The time is displayed in UTC.

ErrorInfo.description:
The error information.

>  This parameter is returned only if the value of `Status` is `Failed`.

Message.example: Unable to enable ECS Insight due to a server error.

EvaluationTime.description: The end time of the check item. The time is displayed in UTC.

Id.description: The ID of the check item.

Result.description: The rate of the non-compliant resources.

Risk.description:
The risk level. Valid values:

*   Error: high risk
*   Warning: medium risk
*   None: no risk

Status.description:
The status of the check item. Valid values:

*   Running: The check is in progress.
*   Finished: The check is complete.
*   failed: The check fails.

The status of the overall check. Valid values:

*   Running: The check is in progress.
*   Finished: The check is complete.
*   failed: The check fails.

404.errorMessage: The specified account has not passed enterprise real name verification. Please complete the verification for the account first.
